main event: A UFO sighting was reported on December 16, 1966 near the Marshall Islands.
interesting points: The UFO was described as oblong, bright white, and appeared to be two to three times larger than a Boeing CT-2 aircraft.
The UFO was observed to change shape from a horizontal plane to a vertical plane.
The UFO appeared and disappeared instantaneously, and was visible for 8 minutes on the first sighting and 3-4 minutes on the second sighting.
Weather conditions in the area, including a weak easterly wave circulation, were noted as a possible factor in the sighting.
The observer was an air traffic controller with the FAA, but the Air Force was unable to obtain further details or make a definitive analysis of the sighting.
